# Start face down, elbows by sides, palms flat. 
# Engage core and glutes, lift body on forearms and toes. 
# Keep a straight line from head to heels. 
# Hold plank, maintain form, glutes tense. 
# Lower back down with control to starting position.

# Lie on your right side, forearm down, align shoulder over elbow. 
# Keep body in a straight line from shoulders to knees. 
# Left arm rests along your body. 
# Engage abs, relax shoulders, elongate spine. 
# Lift into side plank, hold 10 seconds to 1 minute. 
# Lower down, switch to left side, and repeat.

# Begin in a squat, back straight, feet shoulder-width. 
# Place hands on the floor inside feet. 
# Jump feet back into pushup position, weight on hands. 
# Perform a pushup, keeping body straight. 
# Jump feet back to squat position. 
# Stand, lifting arms overhead. 
# Jump up, then land back in squat. 
# Repeat the sequence.

#Place your hands behind you onto a chair, so that your fingers face forward. 
# Extend your legs and start bending your elbows. 
# Lower your body until your arms are at a 90-degree angle. 
# Lift your body back up until your arms are straight. 
# Repeat.

# Begin on your back, knees bent, feet flat. 
# Lift hips, squeeze glutes, straight line from knees to shoulders. 
# Hold position, then lower back down. 
# Repeat the movement.

# Start in plank, balance weight on hands and toes. 
# Ensure hands shoulder-width, back flat, abs tight, head aligned. 
# Drive right knee to chest, then switch legs. 
# Alternate knees quickly, keeping hips steady. 
# Breathe in and out with each leg change.

# Lie face down, arms forward. 
# Lift head, right arm, left leg slightly. 
# Hold for 3 seconds, lower gently. 
# Repeat with left arm, right leg.

# Stand tall with feet hip-width apart, core engaged, shoulders relaxed. 
# Step forward with one foot, heel first, keeping upper body upright. 
# Lower body by bending knees, front thigh parallel to ground, back knee just above floor. 
# Ensure front knee is above ankle, not past toes. 
# Push through front heel to return to start, keeping weight centered. 
# Step forward with opposite foot, repeat lunge on other side. 
# Perform equal reps on each leg for balance and symmetry.

# Stand shoulder-width, head up, shoulders back, core engaged. 
# Inhale, bend knees, push hips back into squat, weight on heels. 
# Exhale, push through heels to stand, maintain upright posture. 
# Repeat for the desired number of reps.

# Start with hands just beyond shoulder-width. 
# Form a straight line from head to feet, engage core. 
# Inhale, lower down until chest touches floor. 
# Exhale, push up to straight arms. 
# Repeat for the desired number of reps.
